rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
When you cast Kr'tah, exile the top seven cards of your library. You may cast nonland cards from among them for as long as they remain exiled.
Whenever you cast or copy a spell, Kr'tah deals damage to any target equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
{2}{R}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
